title: Stalkererererererest

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player each night. You will attack their target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target's target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you would not attack due to attempting to find the target of a player with no target, you will instead attack that player.
